dc_description_s: 1 map ; 38 x 50 cm.|Relief shown pictorially.|Includes the coat of arms of Granada and Murcia on Spain and ships on the ocean.|The title cartouche is framed by two griffins and the scale cartouche includes a cartographer with his tools and a globe.|From his "Atlas Novus" which is a reissue of the "Atlas Major" of 1675 without the text.|This state was published in atlases by Jan Jansson in 1636, 1637, and 1680.|From the Jansson Appendix Atlas 1636-1680, title created to represent a unique collection within the Clark Library, University of Michigan.
